abstract: Intel has used its hefty pile of cash to advance its manufacturing prowess and technology while rival chip makers have struggled to stay afloat.
snippet: Intel has used its hefty pile of cash to advance its manufacturing prowess and technology while rival chip makers have struggled to stay afloat.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  At about this time last year, Intel’s board decided to invest $7 billion in new chip plants in Oregon, Arizona and New Mexico.

headline.main: Intel’s Bet on Innovation Pays Off in Faster Chips
headline.print_headline: Intel’s Bet on Innovation Pays Off in Faster Chips

abstract: Stocks advanced for a second day as technology shares climbed before Intel reported earnings. In addition, business inventories increased more than forecast, overshadowing an unexpected drop in retail sales.
snippet: Stocks advanced for a second day as technology shares climbed before Intel reported earnings. In addition, business inventories increased more than forecast, overshadowing an unexpected drop in retail sales.
lead_paragraph: Stocks advanced for a second day as technology shares climbed before Intel reported earnings. In addition, business inventories increased more than forecast, overshadowing an unexpected drop in retail sales.

headline.main: Technology Helps Shares Higher as Retailers Slip

abstract: Federal prosecutors on Friday again asked for more time to indict three defendants in the Galleon Group insider trading case, as the government and defense lawyers work out potential plea agreements for the men.
snippet: Federal prosecutors on Friday again asked for more time to indict three defendants in the Galleon Group insider trading case, as the government and defense lawyers work out potential plea agreements for the men.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:56 p.m. Federal prosecutors on Friday said that they were near another plea agreement in the Galleon Group case, a disclosure made as the government asked for more time to file indictments against three of the original defendants in the matter.

headline.main: Prosecutors Near New Plea Deal in Galleon Case

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
